name: Boink Zoink Hoink
description:
Match them All!

Place fun pieces on the board to match similar ones and build new pieces or destroy others.

Think strategically where you place your pieces to make your matches at the right spot, and get higher-order pieces.

Search for special items to help you beat harder levels.

Challenge your mind to complete carefully crafted puzzles.

Relax in a playful atmosphere that will make you feel at ease.

Experience various gameplays of Match-2, Match-3 or Match-4, and other twists.

Enjoy a diversity of playable sets by different artists, from cute little fuzzy animals to cartoon monsters, fashionable hats, yummy sweets, scrumptious cakes, legendary fantastic beasts, dragons and much more to come...

Keep your sanity:

  • Play offline anytime anywhere (NO Internet connection required)
  • NO account, NO email, NO phone number required
  • NO in-game currency to artificially hamper your progress
  • NO ads! NO loot boxes! NO fine prints!

You can try it for free on Google Play (download here) to help you decide if you want to play Boink Zoink Hoink on Windows PC (Linux, Mac coming soon), and maybe go further and grant us your valuable support!

itch.io gets a 50/50 split on every amount you can contribute.

Many ways you can help:
  • Buying the game, right here, right now, on itch.io
  • Playing Boink Zoink Hoink on Google Play
  • Subscribing to the BZH314 Youtube channel (100 subscribers needed to get the BZH314 vanity url for the channel! Pretty please :-)
  • Following us on Twitter @BZH314
